Sentencas: For a solid oxide fuel cell, temperature gradient has a great effect on its efficiency and durability.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: In recent years, several observers are developed to estimate the temperature gradient.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: However, the temperature gradient control strategies with suitable observers are not seen.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Therefore, a compound nonlinear controller based on a high-order sliding mode observer is proposed to control the temperature gradient at desired values to improve the solid oxide fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The high-order sliding mode observer is firstly employed to estimate immeasurable internal temperature.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Under the interference of the variations in the initial values of the internal states and measurement noises, the high-order sliding mode observer can estimate the internal temperature distribution with a high precise and a fast convergence.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The compound controller which includes a feedback linearization controller and a feedforward controller is then applied to regulate the estimated temperature gradient.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: During load current changes, the compound controller has the best dynamic performance compared with the feedback linearization controller.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: However, the observed temperature gradient with the two control strategies can both reach the desired value.
Titulo: Temperature gradient control of a solid oxide fuel cell stack
